name: Jeeva Portals, Inc.
overview:
Jeeva Portals offers a social platform for collecting highly useful data in major subject domains like Information technology, Healthcare, and Education by connecting people with similar profiles and needs to share knowledge for mutual benefit.

Jeeva Portals offers the following benefits to users:

1) Forming microcommunities of closely matched peers for discussion of critical issues of mutual interest in major subject areas such as chronic diseases, change management in information technology, or experiences

2) The platform enables moderators of user specific and issue specific discussions to summarize the issues and possible resolutions in a Wiki for everyone’s benefit.

3) Product vendors can mine the resulting database for product design, refinement, and target marketing.

Jeeva Portals’ platform offers a powerful community-based platform that personalizes everything to user specific context unlike monolithic knowledge-bases. The user can search and find resolutions of issues and actively participate within his or her own peer group.

Jeeva ushers in the age of personalization of information to user profiles and needs rather than offer up a deluge to sort through.

Jeeva Portals was founded by Nat Kannan, a serial entrepreneur who has built and exited three previous companies including a sale and an IPO on NASDAQ. It is currently privately held and is located in Boulder, CO.

milestones.description: Developed Version 1.0 of the Micro-community Platform and was selected as one of the Finalists at TSIA - Technology Services Industry Association.  Got a lot of compliments and useful feedback from the Judging Panel and
